item.description: Communism is just bureaucracy in the limit. ‚ÄúSoviet‚Äù is a Russian word for ‚Äúcommittee‚Äù. Which means that ‚ÄúUSSR‚Äù stood for union of socialist committees ü•± Anything that boring was never going to win ‚Äì their parties sucked.

item.title: @elonmusk: 4 months ago an African asylum seeker with an outstanding deportation order r*ped a 10 year old Iris...
item.description: 4 months ago an African asylum seeker with an outstanding deportation order r*ped a 10 year old Irish girl. 48 hours ago the Irish government entered into negotiations to grant amnesty to 1,000 asylum seekers with outstanding deportation orders. This is how Ireland works. The innocence of children has been sacrificed at the altar of diversity.

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK PREDICTS SPACE WILL BE THE CHEAPEST PLACE TO RUN AI INFERENCE ‚ÄúI think the case is a no-br...
item.description: ELON MUSK PREDICTS SPACE WILL BE THE CHEAPEST PLACE TO RUN AI INFERENCE ‚ÄúI think the case is a no-brainer for building solar-powered AI data centers in space‚Äù In space, you get unlimited solar power with panels facing the sun In the shadow, it‚Äôs freezing cold - just 3 Kelvin - giving you an incredibly efficient natural cooling system with a radiator pointed away from the sun

item.title: @elonmusk: Elon Musk explains the ‚Äúfour R‚Äôs‚Äù that will make life multiplanetary: Rapidly Reusable Reliable Rock...
item.description: Elon Musk explains the ‚Äúfour R‚Äôs‚Äù that will make life multiplanetary: Rapidly Reusable Reliable Rockets. The breakthrough is catching the Super Heavy booster with giant mechanical ‚Äúchopsticks‚Äù (Mechazilla arms). No landing legs = no time wasted on leg deployment, pickup, leg retraction, or slow transport. The same tower that stacks the rocket catches it directly after landing and places it straight back on the launch mount in seconds. Booster flight time back to pad: ~5‚Äì6 minutes. Refueling + stacking Starship on top: ~30‚Äì40 minutes. ‚Üí In principle, the entire stack could refly every 1‚Äì2 hours. Next milestone: catch the Starship upper stage the same way. This extreme rapid reuse is the only path to drastically lower the cost per ton to Mars.
